suite.name: Buy Magazine

kw.name: Select PopUp Categories And Book Magazine
Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element '//*[contains(text(), "دسته‌بندی کالاها")]'.

suite.doc: A Test Suit buying magazin from the category books and stationery
